name: TWiki
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: A flexible, powerful, and easy to use enterprise wiki, enterprise collaboration platform, and web application platform.

matches.name: default redirect page title
matches.text: <title>Welcome to TWiki - A Web-based Collaboration Platform</title>

matches.name: powered by text
matches.regexp: (?i-mx: <\/a><\/span>)

matches.name: alternate powered by text
matches.regexp: (?i-mx: This Wiki powered by TWiki <\/a><\/span>)
